title: Transform Your Life with One Powerful Question
description: Do you feel stuck, need momentum, want progress, and desire a breakthrough?   I did when I was trying to be a better piano player.  Then everything changed with one powerful question.  I stopped procrastinating. I felt inspired and motivated. I regained momentum and started making progress. I worked more efficiently. I became happier.  Forget about those hundreds of tips or tricks, and the rah-rah motivational nonsense.  You can start to transform your life by only asking yourself one question!  You will learn how in this book.  The idea is science-based. I will explain in-depth why it works from a neuroscience and psychology perspective. I will also share with you interesting scientific experiments, and inspiring stories of its applications by sports champions and business leaders.  In addition, you will learn: How to make procrastination impossible? How to build successful habits the stress-free way? How to be more efficient? How to make steady and lasting progress? How to become a top achiever?  The truth is: everyone has unleashed power and untapped potential. You already have the answer in you, and you can achieve amazing things beyond your imagination.
author: Jennifer April
